name: CS-Manager DarK v1
description:
So I decided a dark to make a theme for CS-Manager, because dark is always better. It is by no means perfect or 100% finished yet, as there will probably still be some ares I have not styled yet, but I will keep working on it.

To do:
* Icons
* Maybe the 2D match viewer
* Friends list

Fixed:
* Inbox/Outbox pages
* PCW Calendar
